jump_scares.spoiler: Jessie drops a glass during a suspenseful scene
As Cody sits up in bed, a demonic child suddenly appears behind him
The demonic child appears under the bed and grabs Cody’s leg
Mud suddenly spurts out of Sean’s mouth
A large number of butterflies fly off the stairs as Jessie approaches
Jessie turns around and the demonic child appears in front of her
Cody’s mother suddenly walks past Jessie
Mark, now with a hollow face, steps in front of Jessie
The Cankerman grabs Jessie’s shoulder and throws her backwards
